name: Cooking Showdown
description:
This game was made as part of the peel coding competition in 2 days. The theme was  Making life easier during social distancing. We decided to make a game about cooking! During social distancing its important to find was to entertain yourself. This game allows you to experience competition in cooking in a kitchen with your friends! Try new recipes and become the greatest chef!

Goal of the game:

Make an omelette using the ingredients in the fridge!

How to win:

Simply take the ham and egg out of the fridge, cut them with the cutting board and combine in the oven. Hand in to the judges and that's all the prototype has to offer.

Controls:

WASD to move
E to interact
F to Drop Items
Q to quit windows
ESC to pause
Space to cut
